response.overview: Former Rolling Stone music editor Mark Kemp wrote that if The Remains, a little-known group from New England, hadn’t broken up in 1966, “we might today be calling them—and not the Stones—the World’s Greatest Rock ‘n’ Roll Band.” “America’s Lost Band” captures The Remains’ return to Los Angeles 40 years after they last appeared there at Dodger Stadium opening for the Beatles.
response.title: America's Lost Band
